description: Patterns for generating alternative Courses of Action (COAs) when a requirement receives RED-tier boundary impact classification

alternative_patterns.name: Cross-Domain Solution
alternative_patterns.description: Use an approved Cross-Domain Solution instead of direct cross-classification connection
implementation_steps: Identify approved CDS from NSA EPL
Submit CDS connection request to DAA
Define data filter rules
Implement data format adapters
Test cross-domain data flow

alternative_patterns.name: Data Downgrade
alternative_patterns.description: Process data at lower classification level, aggregate results at higher level
implementation_steps: Identify data elements requiring higher classification
Design data decomposition strategy
Implement lower-classification processing pipeline
Create secure aggregation workflow at higher level
Validate results maintain required accuracy

alternative_patterns.name: Phased Implementation
alternative_patterns.description: Split requirement into phases that stay within boundary
implementation_steps: Decompose requirement into boundary-safe phases
Identify minimum viable phase within current boundary
Plan subsequent phases with incremental boundary changes
Submit separate ATO actions per phase
Establish phase gates with compliance checkpoints

alternative_patterns.name: Authorized Proxy
alternative_patterns.description: Use existing authorized system as intermediary/gateway
implementation_steps: Identify existing authorized gateway/proxy systems
Assess proxy system capacity for additional load
Negotiate ISA amendment with proxy system owner
Implement API adapter layer on proxy
Test end-to-end data flow through proxy

alternative_patterns.name: Isolated Enclave
alternative_patterns.description: Create an isolated enclave within existing boundary for sensitive processing
implementation_steps: Define enclave boundary within existing ATO boundary
Implement network segmentation (VLAN, firewall rules)
Apply enhanced controls within enclave
Create SSP addendum for enclave
Validate enclave isolation with penetration testing

alternative_patterns.name: Declassification Pipeline
alternative_patterns.description: Implement automated declassification review to process data at lower classification
tradeoffs: Not applicable to all data types
implementation_steps: Identify data elements eligible for declassification
Obtain declassification authority approval
Implement automated review pipeline with human-in-the-loop
Create audit trail for all declassification decisions
Test pipeline with representative data samples

alternative_patterns.name: Vendor Replacement
alternative_patterns.description: Replace prohibited or high-risk vendor with compliant alternative
tradeoffs: Possible feature gap with alternative vendor
implementation_steps: Identify Section 889 compliant alternative vendors
Conduct SCRM assessment on alternatives
Perform feature gap analysis
Plan migration from prohibited to compliant vendor
Execute migration with parallel-run validation

alternative_patterns.name: Scope Reduction
alternative_patterns.description: Reduce requirement scope to eliminate boundary-breaking elements
tradeoffs: May not fully satisfy stakeholder needs
implementation_steps: Identify specific elements causing RED classification
Propose reduced scope that eliminates boundary impact
Present trade-off analysis to stakeholders
Document accepted scope reduction in requirements
Update decomposition to reflect reduced scope
